name: List Task Runs
description: List task runs with optional filtering by status. Returns runs sorted by newest first with optional limit.

agent_name.description: Name of the agent that executes the task

task_id.description: ID of the task to list runs for

limit.description: Optional limit on number of runs to return

examples.expected_result: Returns array of 10 most recent completed runs

examples.scenario: List all failed runs for debugging
examples.expected_result: Returns all failed runs sorted by newest first
